comment: "Baroco", one of the syllogisms of Aristotelian logic. All ` ph ` is ` ps ` , and some ` ch ` is not ` ps ` , therefore some ` ch ` is not ` ph ` . In Aristotelian notation, AOO-2: PaM and SoM therefore SoP. For example, "All informative things are useful", "Some websites are not useful", therefore "Some websites are not informative". (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 28-Aug-2016.) Reduce dependencies on axioms. (Revised by BJ, 16-Sep-2022.)
